WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,

I would like to know how to clean products entries.

![Image](http://i.imgur.com/DkbL4Jn.jpg)

I have many entries from my test and i can't clean it correctly.

Can you explain how to ? If you can create entries, you should delete it ?

Thanks a lot

Comments.Message: Yes, you can. Rightclick > delete. If it greaed out, change to another product and change back. And yes, it works. ;)

Pushed "wsusutil.exe reset" before and it was fixed somes entries. Now i can delete it, thanks for the trick to change to another product and change back to have the option.

Thanks a lot !
